"Hero Class Aptitude Test IV":
"This is a test to judge whether an ARKS
is suitable for the hero class. This will
allow you to bypass the ability restriction.
This quest is for those who desire further
improvement of their skills and abilities.
※Hero class only, solo only
Defeat [Zeshrayda] using a Sword
Defeat [Blu Ringahda] using a TMG
Defeat [Guar Zigmorde] using a Talis
Lv.61+ enemies
※Hero's level cap increase to 75."
